Html:
I have put Ribbon on a user control in WPF.

  • Then I am using this user control on a WinForm through ElementHost control.
  • Everything works but buttons are neither highlighted on hover nor these buttons clickable.
  • While comboboxes are highlighted and the items are clickable.
  • But if I put this user control on a Wpf Window, buttons and rest of the things behave normally.

Am I doing something abnormal ?
